title: Server Down?
body: Are the servers down? I know there was a noticed about an issue with the Clubs thing but, nothing about a Shut down of the servers

replies.body: Everything looks okay!  Let me know the specific issue you're experiencing exactly, and I'd be happy to help!  Let me know what you're seeing and when, so we can figure this out.  Let me know!
Does the game load? Or does the kernel not work?
